name: Burst Arena?
description:
This is my 2D Shooter project for Week 3. It is named "Burst Arena?". The changes implemented in this version are:

  • Level 1 is similar to the lesson level provided so players can become familiar with the game. 
  • Level 2 has 17 enemies spread through the level with asteroids to take cover and advance. 
  • Level 3 has a Boss, bigger and with more health than the regular enemies, that will follow the player. This boss also gives more points when it's defeated.
  • The Game Loop now includes Instructions to explain the game controls (WSAD and mouse cursor and weapon)
  • If the player defeats the Boss on Level 3, now it is presented a final message and a button to return to the main menu.
